verified_dag:
nodes:
- Data Creation:
    file_name: rmr_agent/repos/rmr_test/notebooks/pipeline.py
    line_range: 7-11
    inputs:
      customer_data_path: gs://my-bucket/data/customer_data.csv
    outputs:
      processed_customer_data_path: gs://my-bucket/data/processed/customer_data_processed.parquet
    component_details:
      file: notebooks/pipeline.ipynb
      line_range: 7-11
      full_path: rmr_agent/repos/rmr_test/notebooks/pipeline.py
- Feature Engineering:
    file_name: rmr_agent/repos/rmr_test/notebooks/pipeline.py
    line_range: 13-17
    inputs:
      customer_data_path: gs://my-bucket/data/customer_data.csv
      age_bins: '[0, 30, 50, 100]'
      age_bin_labels: '[''Young'', ''Middle'', ''Senior'']'
    outputs:
      processed_customer_data_path: gs://my-bucket/data/processed/customer_data_processed.parquet
    component_details:
      file: notebooks/pipeline.ipynb
      line_range: 13-17
      full_path: rmr_agent/repos/rmr_test/notebooks/pipeline.py
- Feature Selection:
    file_name: rmr_agent/repos/rmr_test/notebooks/pipeline.py
    line_range: 19-38
    inputs:
      processed_data_path: gs://my-bucket/data/processed/customer_data_processed.parquet
      test_size: '0.2'
      random_state: '42'
    outputs:
      train_data_path: gs://my-bucket/data/processed/train_data.parquet
      test_data_path: gs://my-bucket/data/processed/test_data.parquet
    component_details:
      file: notebooks/pipeline.ipynb
      line_range: 19-38
      full_path: rmr_agent/repos/rmr_test/notebooks/pipeline.py
- Data Preprocessing:
    file_name: rmr_agent/repos/rmr_test/notebooks/pipeline.py
    line_range: 40-49
    inputs:
      train_data_path: gs://my-bucket/data/processed/train_data.parquet
    outputs:
      normalized_train_data_path: gs://my-bucket/data/processed/normalized_train_data.parquet
      scaler_save_path: /home/user/models/scaler.pkl
    component_details:
      file: notebooks/pipeline.ipynb
      line_range: 40-49
      full_path: rmr_agent/repos/rmr_test/notebooks/pipeline.py
- Model Training:
    file_name: rmr_agent/repos/rmr_test/notebooks/pipeline.py
    line_range: 51-61
    inputs:
      normalized_train_data_path: gs://my-bucket/data/processed/normalized_train_data.parquet
      n_estimators: '100'
      random_state: '42'
      training_label_column: label
    outputs:
      model_artifact_path: /home/user/models/random_forest.pkl
    component_details:
      file: notebooks/pipeline.ipynb
      line_range: 51-61
      full_path: rmr_agent/repos/rmr_test/notebooks/pipeline.py
- Model Evaluation:
    file_name: rmr_agent/repos/rmr_test/notebooks/pipeline.py
    line_range: 63-74
    inputs:
      model_path: /home/user/models/random_forest.pkl
      scaler_path: /home/user/models/scaler.pkl
      test_data_path: gs://my-bucket/data/processed/test_data.parquet
    outputs:
      evaluation_results_path: /home/user/models/eval_results.txt
    component_details:
      file: notebooks/pipeline.ipynb
      line_range: 63-74
      full_path: rmr_agent/repos/rmr_test/notebooks/pipeline.py
edges:
- from: Data Creation

- from: Feature Selection
